name: Inviolable Faith
flavorText: Such a heavy, unwieldy object would ordinarily be impractical for the battlefield. However, this weapon has been blessed to slam into its targets with unusual force-wrecking doors, bodies, and even barricades—while also offering superior protection to the faithful.
flavorTextHtml: Such a heavy, unwieldy object would ordinarily be impractical for the battlefield. However, this weapon has been blessed to slam into its targets with unusual force-wrecking doors, bodies, and even barricades—while also offering superior protection to the faithful.

secondary.textHtml: Casting Consecration also casts Consecration beneath all of your allies.
secondary.text: Casting Consecration also casts Consecration beneath all of your allies.
